text: How can we get HubDB set up for template developer accounts ? I'm attempting to move some work from one portal to another that DOESN'T have HubDB enabled and it's blocking me from shuffling the templates back and forth when one doesn't have access
It'd be great to have limited DB access for creating dynamic pages in template packs (say, limit of 10 tables and a limit of 1000 rows instead of the 10k normal)
